attributes.action: Use army and resources to help the firefighters on the moors wildfires
attributes.background: The wild fires on Saddleworth Moor and winter hill area are as the description says are not under control and more resources need to be made available to assist the firefighters mainly from the armed forces and there equipment to assist  getting basics like water and manpower to where it is needed

rejection.details: The armed forces are already helping to tackle the fires, so we're not sure what further action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
